title: My main account is banned for no reason
body: Hello.My main acc is named Ivanus Ivanator.3 or 4 days ago i tried to log in but it turned out im perma banned.I didnt get any info on my email and i didnt even play that week.I already sent 2 tickets about this and no one is responding and my account is still banned.I spent so much time on in and im on edge of quiting leage (yep i may be the first player to leave this game).Pls help me. PS im having a tournament in my city for galaxy s8's and i rly dont want to blow that shot.{{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body: If you never saw any kind of reform card or message about the ban, you should definitely hit up the account recovery team asap in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). It's likely someone could have hacked your account and this was just a protective suspension to avoid any further harm. Reach out to them and they'll be able to get this straightened out ^_^!
I came back to two accounts perma banned, no emails to speak of, just $200 in Riot Points purchase down the drain. Also no reply on tickets ever.
I Hope it wont happen to me
